document_data.caption: A map showing the Towers of Thoth (labeled #23) in the City of the Gods.
document_data.name: Tower of Thoth
document_data.location: [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]], [[Skuld]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Towers of Thoth''' were a sacred group of towers located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Towers were located in the northeast corner of the [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the northern central part of the city.
document_data.History: The Towers of Thoth were thousands of years old as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}. They served as a home for the [[incarnation]] of [[Thoth]], the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] [[god]] of knowledge.
